__e: This love... my enemies would call a weakness, something to be exploited.
She knows how to work it and she uses people like the best of 'em.
Don't think she doesn't know how to use that, because she does.
I thought we could use the time to figure out a way to exploit the company's tech and eventually send you home.
Ours is not to reason why, Charlie, ours is to take advantage of that hard thing and fuck it.
Sometimes when we hit bottom... we ask the wrong people for help-- people who use our weaknesses against us, get us to do things that we never thought we could.
